tier.item: Eeri da isa wu wa si o ri, u na ku eeri uhu
Ajini, o ewa tama ayi uhwoo de,
Oo nee tu uhwoo, ajini si vara eeri
`Yesterday gives you food, and you have eaten it,
Then you turn around to haul insults at yesterday,
Because by tomorrow, today would have become yesterday.'
